Flow.description: This mobile flow is used in the SFS App to create Time Sheet Entries based on status transitions of the Service Appointment.
Flow.interviewLabel: SFS Timesheet entry and status transitions {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: SFS Timesheet entry and status transitions

recordUpdates.name: In_Progress_to_Canceled_Cannot_Complete
recordUpdates.label: SA In Progress to Canceled/Cannot Complete Update

recordUpdates.name: Update_WO_Status_to_In_Progress
recordUpdates.label: Update WO Status to In Progress

recordUpdates.name: WO_In_Progress_to_Canceled_CannotComplete_Update
recordUpdates.label: WO In Progress to Canceled/CannotComplete Update

fields.name: LogTravelHome
fields.fieldText:
Would you like to create a Time Sheet Entry for your travel home? Our estimates show it will take you {!VAR_EstimatedTravelHome} minutes to get home.


Travel Start: {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}

Estimated Arrival at Home: {!FORM_EstimatedHomeArrivalTime}

fields.name: Yes_create_Time_Sheet_Entry
fields.fieldText: Yes, create Time Sheet Entry for travel home
